title: Ryuu To Yuusha To Haitatsunin Shikaban
alternative_title: 竜と勇者と配達人 私家版; The Dragon; the Hero; and the Courier: Self-Published Edition
status: 竜と勇者と配達人 私家版; The Dragon; the Hero; and the Courier: Self-Published Edition
description:
Description :
        Bonus chapters that never made it into volumes, infodumps, behind-the-scene stories, new bonus chapters, and much more from "The Dragon, the Hero, and the Courier", a rather strange medieval fantasy manga.This book was self-published by the author with permission from Shueisha.

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 2.4: Setting Part 4 - Revival And Levels

Chapter 2.1: Setting Part 1 - The World & Idazig
